metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Metadata to filter by. Exact match filter for each KV pair.

graph_id.title: Graph Id
graph_id.description: The ID of the graph to filter by. The graph ID is normally set in your langgraph.json configuration.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The number of results to skip.

select.title: Select
select.description: Specify which fields to return. If not provided, all fields are returned.
